mapper.insert: insert into sugarmanage( situation, sugarMedication, acpc, sugarLevel, acpcMemo, sugarRecordDate, sugarRecordTime, famNo ) values( #{situation}, #{sugarMedication}, #{acpc}, #{sugarLevel}, #{acpcMemo}, #{sugarRecordDate}, #{sugarRecordTime}, #{famNo} )
mapper.select: select s.sugarNo, s.situation, s.sugarMedication, s.acpc, s.sugarLevel, s.acpcMemo, s.sugarRecordDate, s.sugarRecordTime, s.famNo, f.famMember, u.userId from sugarmanage s, user u, family f where s.famNo=f.famNo and f.userId = #{userId}
select * from sugarmanage where famNo=#{famNo} order by sugarRecordDate desc LIMIT 7
mapper.update: update sugarmanage set situation =#{situation}, sugarMedication =#{sugarMedication}, acpc =#{acpc}, sugarLevel =#{sugarLevel}, acpcMemo =#{acpcMemo}, sugarRecordDate =#{sugarRecordDate}, sugarRecordTime =#{sugarRecordTime}, famNo = #{famNo} where sugarNo = #{sugarNo}
